title: Recommendation- Tiny serifs
content:
I’m looking for any typeface similar to a bold friz quadrata. Heavy, grotesque, with tiny serifs. Any suggestions? It’ll be used to evoke a horror, children of the corn/dawn of the dead mood.

 [‹ And you thought you'd never use the 'ffl' ligature combination](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808073900/http:/typophile.com/node/19055 "Go to previous forum topic") [To the best typographers in the world ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808073900/http:/typophile.com/node/18579 "Go to next forum topic")
author: koleslaw

comments.content:
This isn’t quite as bold, but has a cool feel to it... Eidetic Neo
